title: Lindsey Graham unimpressed with Anderson Cooper’s ‘hard-hitting’ takedown of the Biden scandal
text:
CNN moderator Anderson Cooper was up first at Tuesday night’s debate, and of course, the first questions asked of all 12 candidates on stage were all about impeachment. When it came time to question Joe Biden, Cooper made it clear that Biden had been falsely accused by President Trump and there was no evidence of wrongdoing by Hunter Biden or his father.

Lindsey Graham was not impressed.

What a “HARD-HITTING” takedown on the Hunter Biden scandal by @CNN. Can only imagine if the shoe was on the other foot and this was @VP Pence's son. What a joke. #DemDebates — Lindsey Graham (@LindseyGrahamSC) October 16, 2019

Here’s video:

CNN’s Anderson Cooper runs interference for the Democrats, claims that Trump “falsely” accused Biden of corruption Biden responds by lying, falsely claims that he never talk to his son about business. Even his son said that he did. pic.twitter.com/jxeVoHTSIU — Ryan Saavedra (@RealSaavedra) October 16, 2019

CNN moderators note there is “no evidence of wrongdoing” (sure ok) by Hunter Biden, which clearly isn’t the same standard for the impeachment pitchfork party. — Dana Loesch (@DLoesch) October 16, 2019

"I never discussed a single thing about anything having to do with Ukraine. And no one says that I did." —Joe Biden at the #DemocraticDebate “Dad said, ‘I hope you know what you are doing [joining Burisma],’ and I said, ‘I do.’ ”—Hunter Biden to the New Yorker, 7/8/19 — Michael Knowles (@michaeljknowles) October 16, 2019

Did you catch that Anderson Cooper in his question about Hunter Biden said that Trump “falsely accused” Biden. — askme (@askme43286689) October 16, 2019

"Your son is falsely accused of wrongdoing", says Anderson Cooper to Joe Biden. He got 50k a month to do a job in Ukraine he knew nothing about because his father was vice president, that's criminally suspect Anderson. — Eva 👻 (@EvaBronn) October 16, 2019

Joe Biden: “No one has indicated” that I discussed Ukraine with my son. Except Hunter told the New Yorker they did, with Joe warning him: “I hope you know what you are doing.” Who’s lying? #DemDebate — Michael Ahrens (@michael_ahrens) October 16, 2019

Joe Biden lied just now during the debate. FLASHBACK to this morning, after claiming no discussion, Hunter Biden admits conversation with Joe Biden about Ukraine business. #DemDebate pic.twitter.com/Mziy8sM7in — Steve Guest (@SteveGuest) October 16, 2019

Anderson Cooper to Biden: “You’ve been falsely accused” Welp, I guess that’s the final word. After Anderson Coopers extensive investigation into Biden/Ukraine – it’s been declared false. We should all thank Anderson Cooper and CNN for their thorough work and investigations — Extremely Stable Genius (@FiatJustitia_) October 16, 2019

Anderson Cooper just made the statement to Joe Biden that President Trump falsely accused Hunter Biden of wrong doing. How does Anderson Cooper know it’s false. Answer: (HE DOESN’T) It just shows the blatant bias in this CLOWN debate! — USCG Proud (@uscg_proud) October 16, 2019

I love that Anderson Cooper says Trump falsely accused Hunter Biden instead of accused, what a tip off of extreme bias. — Randy Treibel (@therealrainfall) October 16, 2019

@cnn @andersoncooper both suck. Cooper just said “Trump falsely accused Hunter Biden…”. Where did he get that confirmation that this was a false accusation? The bias of a failing network. — Ocho Fox (@thewhit70) October 16, 2019

Anderson Cooper to Joe Biden: “Mr Trump has falsely accused your son….” well so much for an unbiased media at the debate!! @CNN @NewYorkTimes11 @nytopinion — Kristi Nelson (Gittins) (@kgittins) October 16, 2019

Anderson Cooper just prefaced his question to Biden by noting "You have been falsely accused." I had a hard time deciding whether to laugh, yell or throw up. What a joke. — Jeff Carlson (@themarketswork) October 16, 2019

Cooper to Biden: "Trump FALSELY accused your son … "

A Candy Crowely moment? — SNARK-enfreude (@Fritzz2009) October 16, 2019

Anderson Cooper just said Trump falsely accused Hunter Biden. Did I miss an investigation? — JHud (@jh_patriot) October 16, 2019

Anderson Cooper “Joe Biden- Your son has been FALSELY accused….” Anderson the crackerjack reporter knows that to be true about as thoroughly as he “knows” Trump worked with Russia to steal an election. Remarkable neutral media. — Taylor (@oldarmy1) October 16, 2019

Anderson Cooper really just said Trump FALSELY accused Hunter Biden of wrongdoing. Cooper, your bias is showing. #DemDebate — Jessica Fletcher (@heckyessica) October 16, 2019

LOL Anderson Cooper asks abt conflict of interest re: Hunter Biden/Ukraine and says: “Trump has *falsely* accused your son of doing something wrong” and said there is “no evidence” that Biden engaged in any “wrongdoing.” This is a very serious, unbiased debate, guys. #DemDebate — Amanda Prestigiacomo (@AmandaPresto) October 16, 2019

Biden pressed on his son Hunter’s shady Ukraine dealings: "What we have to do now is focus on Donald Trump. He doesn’t want me to be the candidate. He is going after me because he knows if I get the nomination, I will beat him like a drum.” Okay, Joe.pic.twitter.com/30eEVgn9Wo — BlazeTV (@BlazeTV) October 16, 2019

“Falsely accused of doing something wrong” journo Anderson Cooper says to Joe Biden about Hunter Biden This after every Democrat on stage asserts that Trump has clearly and unambiguously committed enough crimes to go to prison for life, and no usage of “alleged” Seems fair — Buck Sexton (@BuckSexton) October 16, 2019

Maybe we should watch CNN more so we don’t miss their in-depth investigations into things like the Biden-Ukraine “scandal.”
description: Let me ask you about Ukraine, of which you've been falsely accused and of which there is no evidence.
